function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of health protections and economic support for garment workers in Asian supply chains","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and economic hardship for workers","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety measures, provide economic support, and ensure universal healthcare access","Technologies":"Health and safety training, financial support systems, universal healthcare access","People":"Garment workers, informal workers, casual workers, seasonal workers, migrant workers, home-based workers","Owner":"Governments, brands, suppliers"},{"Description":"Women in feminised sectors at risk of continued exposure to the virus","Impact":"Higher likelihood of infection due to continued exposure to the virus","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, provide health care and income support, address the feminisation of certain sectors","Technologies":"Social distancing guidelines, healthcare facilities, income support systems","People":"Women in health, education, retail, and feminised sectors","Owner":"Governments, employers, industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Lack of strict health and safety measures in health and social work sectors","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for workers in these sectors","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce strict health and safety protocols, provide necessary protective equipment","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE), health monitoring technology, strict health and safety guidelines","People":"Health and social work workers","Owner":"Government agencies, employers, industry associations"}]}
